hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abdullah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“No person is killed wrongfully, but a share of responsibility for his blood will be upon, the first son of Adam, because he was the first one to kill.”

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّغْلِيظِ فِي قَتْلِ مُسْلِمٍ ظُلْمًا
chapter.eng-name: The Severity Of Killing A Muslim
